title: Video: Clu – Evening Ever
content:
I was recommended Clu by Irish beatmaking poster boy Mmoths whilst at The Great Escape festival in Brighton, and needless to say, I checked them out almost as soon as I returned.

Their new video for the Burial-inspired Evening Ever is a wonderfully youthful affair, following two lads as they explore what appears to be an abandoned leisure complex. Immaculately shot, it’s a video full of beautiful imagery and poignant scenes, fitting to the downbeat yet tender music. Check it out below. (Video directed by Finn Keenan)
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
